q: Tuesday signed his first endorsement deal since serving 18 months in federal prison. The athlete signed a two-year contract with gridiron padding producer Unequal Technologies( UT), according to the Associated Press. We're real excited about it, UT chief executive officer Rob Vito said. " Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity. This is what makes America so great."

statement that some objects including a Heart Scarab and a small Ushabti statue were found. Part of a coffin dating back to the Modern Kingdom 3,000 years ago was also found outside the museum. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. said that despite cuts to their grants, a number of Tory and Liberal Democrat councils were funding student travel costs, which was the "statutory duty" of local authorities. Mr Michael Gove told MPs: Essex razed travel costs for children in receipt of a range of benefits and in Hull, Liberal Democrat-controlled Hull, any student in receipt of Education Maintenance Allowance also gets a travel grant to cope with the full cost. "It is no surprise that there are Liberal Democrat and Conservative councils which are ensuring that all students receive the support they deserve. It's striking that this is in addition to Education Maintenance Allowance. Mr Michael Gove 's comments will risk fuelling Tory backbench fears of an electoral pact between the parties.
